scripts.test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=ci concurrently -k --success last "npm run test:server" "npm run test:selenium"
scripts.sauce: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=sauce concurrently -k --success last "npm run test:server" "npm run test:selenium"
